<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">1.1 注册登陆腾讯元器</span></h3>
<p>腾讯元器的官网：https://yuanqi.tencent.com/</p>
<p>其实这个元器就类似于字节的扣子，还有开源的dify，n8n。有很多这样的。</p>
<p>如果大家的公众号是认证过的，那么你可以直接使用扣子或者其他的ai智能体平台也行。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>我为啥选择这个元器。是因为腾讯元器平台 可以接入不认证的公众号。</p>
<p>这个就是我之前创建的智能体。</p>
<p><img alt="image" width="1049" height="414" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250813165538630-255196815.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">1.2 创建智能体</span></h3>
<ul>
<li>这里的智能体分两种。</li>
<li>一种是对话型智能体，其实就是普通的智能体。</li>
<li>一种是公众号智能体，这种的就是直接可以扫码授权。然后智能体会根据你公众号三年之内的文章，自动生成知识库。然后智能体会自动去知识库搜索答案。如果没有答案大模型会回答问题。</li>
</ul>

<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">1.3 对话型智能体</span></h3>
<p><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">这个是不带公众号文章知识库的。</span></p>
<p><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">名称和简介需要写一下。</span></p>
<p><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">头像可以ai生成，也可以自己找一张，后面可以修改，也可以不弄头像。</span></p>

<p>咱们就简单的弄下，后面大家有需求的话，可以自己调整。</p>

<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">1.4&nbsp;公众号智能体</span></h3>
<p>&nbsp;这个智能体，是需要公众号扫码授权，然后智能体会自动去帮你生成三年内的文章知识库。</p>
<p>里面的一些细节大家可以自行去调整。</p>
<p>反正就是会生成知识库。</p>
<p><img alt="image" width="620" height="538" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250813172229146-1046896606.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" width="918" height="507" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250813172358257-287885709.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2.5em auto 2em; padding: 3px 10px 1px; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18.2px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); text-align: center; line-height: 1.75; display: table; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); background: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-radius: 3px; visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">📖 其次：发布智能体到公众号</span></h2>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">2.1 发布对话型智能体</span></h3>
<p>把这种不带知识库的智能体发布到公众号。</p>
<p>让公众号接入ai。</p>
<p>点击进入智能体，然后点击应用发布。这个发布的地方有好几个都是可以的</p>
<p>主要是微信公众号授权这块。</p>
<p>填写appid</p>
<p>最后点击发布就行了。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>对话型和公众号类型的 都是这样发布的。这个时候你的公众号 已经接入智能体了</p>
<p><img alt="image" width="838" height="463" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250821103652760-573254606.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="image" width="763" height="453" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250821103811536-1056476865.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2.5em auto 2em; padding: 3px 10px 1px; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18.2px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); text-align: center; line-height: 1.75; display: table; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); background: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-radius: 3px; visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">👀 展示：查看效果</span></h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">3.1 关注后自动回复消息</span></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img alt="image" width="864" height="925" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250821104327923-230536314.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2em 8px 0.75em 0; padding: 0 0.2em; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16.8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.2; color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">3.2 智能对话</span></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img alt="image" width="867" height="928" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1257808/202508/1257808-20250821104424534-1105310484.png" class="lazyload"></p>

<h2 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 2.5em auto 2em; padding: 3px 10px 1px; outline: 0; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18.2px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; border: 0 solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); text-align: center; line-height: 1.75; display: table; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); background: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-radius: 3px; visibility: visible" data-pm-slice="0 0 []"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: 0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible">🎍 总结</span></h2>
